subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के अधिकांति भाषा क्या है?
explanation_en: Gujarati is the official language of Rajasthan. The state government uses Gujarati for official purposes.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान की अधिकांति भाषा गुजराती है। राजस्थान की सरकार भाषा गुजराती करती है।

question_en: What is the most visited tourist destination in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jodhpur is a popular tourist destination in Rajasthan, known for its historical monuments and culture.
